update operate set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select operate.*, case when menu_operate.id is null then false else true end as checked from operate left join menu_operate on operate.id = menu_operate.operate_id and menu_operate.menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
